name: es-module-lexer
description: Lexes ES modules returning their import/export metadata

scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:asm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.footprint: npm run build && echo Wasm: && cat dist/lexer.js | brotli | wc -c && echo Asm.js: && cat dist/lexer.asm.js | brotli | wc -c
